name: Alchemistry (itch)
description:
In a world where both Alchemy and Chemistry runs the world. Go on an adventure and save the world from those who wants to disturb the balance of the world.  Don't be worried as there are brave souls willing to help you on your journey. You are the only hope of the World of Selenia. In this world, weapons and armor are rarely sold. In order for you to be able to do your quest, you have several abilities at your disposal.

  • Alchemy, your most useful ability. Allows you to craft myriads of items, weapons, and armors that will assist you in your journey.
  • Plentiful materials dropped or stolen from enemies and are often sold at shops in towns.
  • Branching Paths, allowing you to experience the world in different ways.
  • Multiple Endings, depends on how you do things.
  • Relationships, increase your relationship with your allies by giving them gifts. They might get stronger if you do.
  • Occasional shenanigans here and there.

Controls:

  • For Windows: Keyboard and Mouse
  • For Android: Single Touch for Movement and Double Touch to access the menu and cancel.

*Note, This is a demo. Several features stated above may not be available yet.
